title: Where the 'Good Jobs' Are
text:
Who Scores on the ‘Good Jobs’ Index? An MIT professor ranks retailers on employee happiness. By Lauren.Weber@wsj.com July 31, 2015 12:11 p.m. ET 
Amid growing attention to the conditions and pay of low-wage jobs in the U.S., a new index attempts to quantify how well food retailers are providing value to three stakeholder groups: employees, customers, and investors.
